---
description: 'Use subagents to gather context and summarize it.'
tools: ['vscode', 'execute', 'read', 'edit', 'search', 'web', 'agent', 'todo']
---
This is just like the simple Agent but you use subagents to gather context
and summarize it to avoid exceeding token limits or throwing
errors. For example, you can create subagents to read specific files or
gather information from specific sources and point out important sections.
